definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: The Lahti orchestra has the most extensive cooperation with the world of business.
sentences.chinese: 拉赫蒂交響樂團與企業界與着最廣泛的合作。

sentences.english: Well go to a concert tomorrow evening to hear the symphony orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 明天晚上我們去參加音樂會，聽交響樂隊的演奏。

sentences.english: The symphony ends in a pianissimo.
sentences.chinese: 這部交響樂以弱音樂章結束。

sentences.english: The last good thing written in C was Franz Schubert's Symphony Number 9. -- Erwin Dieterich, programmer
sentences.chinese: 用C寫的最後的一個好東西就是舒伯特的第九交響樂。

sentences.english: The London Symphony Orchestra  broadcasts every Sunday on London Station.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦交響樂團每星期日都在倫敦電臺演出節目。

sentences.english: And India plays a large role in this multi-country orchestration of development of new products.
sentences.chinese: 印度在這個新產品開發的多國交響樂中演奏重頭樂器。

sentences.english: The trombone is an essential musical instrument for a symphony orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 拉管是交響樂隊不可缺少的樂器之一。

sentences.english: Constance: Why does this hazelnut symphony always make me want to dance?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼這種榛果交響樂總讓我想跳舞呢？

sentences.english: He worked with the BBC Philharmonic and the Royal Opera House in London.
sentences.chinese: 他在倫敦曾與BBC交響樂團和英國皇家歌劇院合作。

sentences.english: Since then, there was an orchestra which was named after the city.
sentences.chinese: 從此，杭城也有了以自己城市命名的交響樂團。

sentences.english: After the symphony orchestra finished its performance, the chairman stepped on platform.
sentences.chinese: 在交響樂團表演完後，主席走上講臺。

sentences.english: He is currently a second violin section player of the National Symphony Orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 現任國家交響樂團小提琴演奏員。
交響樂通常都是無標題音樂。

sentences.english: What is the latitude and longitude of the N-arrow in the Symphony Lake?
sentences.chinese: 在交響樂湖畔N箭頭所指處的經度和緯度各是多少？
交響樂通常都是無標題音樂。

sentences.english: He played the French horn in an orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在一個交響樂團裏演奏法國號。
